mapper.sql: project_change_log_.id AS project_change_log_id, project_change_log_.project_id AS project_change_log_project_id, project_change_log_.name AS project_change_log_name, project_change_log_.note AS project_change_log_note, project_change_log_.version AS project_change_log_version, project_change_log_.url AS project_change_log_url, project_change_log_.issue_change_date AS project_change_log_issue_change_date, project_change_log_.create_date AS project_change_log_create_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_project_change_log ( project_id, `name`, note, version, url, issue_change_date, create_date ) VALUES ( #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issueChangeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
